quest_desc.qdesc: 300119(그 용은 멋있었다) 아르젠타에게 퀘스트 습득 1번맵 들어가면 데이비드 있음. 대화. 3번 맵에서 보스문 앞에 데이비드. 대화 보스맵에서 술통 깨뜨리면 실패 메시지. 보스맵에서 술통 깨뜨리지 않고, 보스 클리어 보스맵에서 데이비드와 대화. 아르젠타에게 보고.

qnpc.npckname: 아르젠타의 두번째 노예 데이비드(고요한 수도원 본당)

talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Acclaimed Adventurer David$
Do you want my signature? First signature will be free!. Heh.
(You must receive the quest from Argenta at Gray Ruins to proceed.)

$Argenta$
What task should I pass you?
Because you owe me one, "you are willing to do anything for me, you savior", right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I'm not a slave, your slave ... </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
You did! Are you trying to deny now?

$Argenta$
You are a slave. To be specific, you are my slave.
If you are not convince, the necklace you are wearing, does look good on my slave.

$Argenta$
Knowing that you are my slave, now behave like one. You are only allowed to do this alone.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party.)

$Argenta$
You are too foolish.
…Oh, because you are a fool, I think I have more work for you.

$Argenta$
Go get me a book. A few days ago, I found a fashionable book at the Marketplace. But my friend seems angry when he saw it.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Normally, people won't resort to such acts.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
About the book, there was this dragon that was so cool. As soon as Geraint saw me holding on to it, he flare up and snatch the book away from me and insist that this book contains nothing but misconception and prejudice. Is not very normal for people to just snatch someone's book and throw it away, right? He is one strange guy.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> I'm off to Silent Monastery Main Hall. </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
I heard there is a same book lying around Silent Monastery Main Hall. All you have to do now is to get my that book, Easy?
<html>$Argenta's Reading$ </html>

$Argenta$
I never did get to tell Geraint off for that. I'll have to have words with him next time I see him.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (I feel the presence of evil laughter) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Heh. Heh. Heh. Hello Newbie! Not by any chance you are following, Great Adventurer David again?
Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(This time, I am here for a book)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
So what's the excuse can you come up to follow me around?
If you excuse is good, I might consider helping Just... for you. Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You are finding a book as well? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
What? Hold on...book? (Adventurer David looked overly surprized)
Uh.. Yeah... I see... A Book…

$Adventurer David$
(Adventurer David gave a surprized and panic look and avoid eye contact with you.) I... I am the Defender of Justice Please retrain from being rude to such Great Adventurer. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Hope to see you again!. Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David search for a place to hide frantically.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> (Now I am getting sick of him) </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Oops! {user_nick}! Are you following me again? I really have to praise your patience.
Heh. Heh. Heh.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(I want ignore this guy very badly)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Heh. Heh. Heh. My name is Great Adventurer David!! I am very sure that you are following me, am I right?

$Adventurer David$
I will never hide! Now, behold my bravery. Those monster are no match for me!
(Adventurer David hide himself in a very brave and quick manner)

$Adventurer David$
You made it this far! {user_nick}!
Well, needless to say, is due to my protection! Heh. Heh. Heh.

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
There nothing to be shy about. All you need to do is to thank me. Heh. Heh. Heh.
But.. I might suggest something for you.

$Acclaimed Adventurer David$
You know that Head of Brethren lives in there, right? Because I'm Brave, Awesome, and Fearless adventurer. I will get the book for you!

$Adventurer David$
Instead, just protect me for a short time from monsters while I am looking for the book. Ha. Ha. Ha. Just for a short time! I am not asking you too much, right?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>After all, I will be the one fightening them, not you.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Ahem! You misunderstood me! I was just trying to protect myself so that I can find the book quickly. Be careful of my barrel, I was afraid you might destroy it. Ahem.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> No one in the party wants to accept you? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
This is why I am not a Newbie adventurer like you. Have you not ever heard of helping one another?
If you do not change, no want would want you in the party in the future.. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
Shut up! Anyway be careful not to break my barrel shield while I am looking for the book. Heh.

$Adventurer David$
While I am looking for the book, just be cautious and not break my barrel shield! Heh. Heh. Heh. If I don't succeed, you are to be blame, for everything, and you need to start from scratch, you foolish newbie! Heh.

$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
I see you have failed to keep my Barrel Shield intact...! Let's retreat and head back now!! If you insist of finding that book, you need to start from scratch again! I'll be back at the dungeon entrance waiting for you. Heh.
(Fail to complete quest. Please restart from the beginning.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> Oh, the book is with you, right? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
You have just witness, Adventurer David's prowess skills? Heh. Heh. Heh.
(Adventurer David arrogance is acting again as he showed you the book.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Open the book and tries to read)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
Ha. Ha. Ha. Hey Rookie! What do you think about my skills? Did you get any impressions? But, don't be so moved at me~
Ha. Ha. Ha.

$The cool dragon$
As soon as Gold Dragon roar, 59211 monsters vanish in split seconds. Gold Dragon was so powerful.
(The actual story in the book goes like this. After Gold Dragon wipes reduce 916834 worlds to dust, the Dragon battle thousands of Ancients who have ability to swing the Leica of Storm...)

$Adventurer David$
Why do you want such old book? Anyway, I have accomplished your promise, right Newbie?
Do remember that you owe me one!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html> You remove those books from the shelf, didn’t you? </html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:Talk}
What? That guys seems to be mistaken about something. But I will be gracious and forgive you this time. Heh. Heh. Heh. Well, if there's nothing else would you please excuse me, i'm a very busy person!
(Adventurer David reach out to grab a few books from the shelf.)

$Adventurer David$
All this are reference materials! I have no intention of no intention of making profit out of these books!!!
(Seems like this is the true intention of Adventurer David's purpose here.)

$Self-Acclaimed Adventurer David$
These books are the re... reference materials! I would never thought about selling these books in public!!!
(It looks like those books were the Adventurer David's main purpose of coming here.)

$Argenta$
Are you doing this on purpose? Coming to me when I can't remember handling you this job at all.

$Argenta$
…Hm.. Well, because slaves have no choice. Anyway, where's the Book?
If you came here empty handed, I am so gonna get you!

$Argenta$
Why does the book look so long ago, even though this book is release recently only... like 50 years ago? .
(Argenta flip through the pages of the book)

$Argenta$
What is this? What is it saying? How come all the dragons in this book are so stupid? Why dragons are crazy about gold? Why dragons love to eat children's meat? It's so weird!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(What has it got to do with the Ancients?)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Argenta$
This is so silly. The main character, Ancient does not seem to be a true Ancient. Don't you agree with me? I can't believe this!
(She grumbles but still reads everything.)

$Argenta$
Come on! This is just a bunch of nonsensical and senseless... novel? Why didn’t Geraint just let me read it back then?!. Ugh... Stupid Geraint!! And you.. You are nowhere better! {user_nick}!!

$Argenta$
Why did you even bring this Boring Book?
What a waste of time.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

$Argenta$
I'm going to dispose this book later. Visit me later and do my a favor because I am hungry right now. I am sure won't reject my request, right?
(Next quest is available at level 19 or higher)

journal.title: Argenta and the Book
journal.contents:
Argenta wants to read a book that she stumble upon ages ago. Head down to Silent Monastery Main Hall to retrieve the book.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party.)

Cristal Stream → Blizzard Plain(Silent Monastery Gate) → Silent Monastery Main Hall

journal.title: Encounters with Adventurer David
journal.contents:
I met a strange man named, Adventurer David. He calls himself as Adventurer David, but still a strange man. Since the book that Argenta requested cannot be found here, you wander into the deeper area.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party.)

Blizzard Plain(Silent Monastery Gate) → Silent Monastery Main Hall
journal.destination: (Solo) Explore the Silent Monastery Main Hall
journal.todo_msg: There is no book around here. Please venture into the deeper area.

journal.title: Adventurer David's Suggestion
journal.contents:
Adventurer David seem to have something to say to you. Talk to Adventurer David, he might know something regarding the book.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party.)

Silent Monastery Main Hall → Adventurer David

journal.title: Kill Head of Brethren(s)
journal.contents:
Unintentionally, you have accepted Adventurer David's request. Survive those monster attacks without breaking Adventurer David's Barrel Shield.Meaning, you have to Kill Monsters and Head of Monsters without Adventurer David.
(You cannot proceed the quest while in a party)

Blizzard Plain(Silent Monastery Gate) → Silent Monastery Main Hall
journal.todo_msg: Please kill Head of Brethren(s) as Adventurer David suggested.

journal.title: Adventurer David and the Book
journal.contents:
You have been defeated Head of Vero(s). Let's go talk to Adventurer David if he found the book.

Silent Monastery Main Hall ? Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: You have been defeated Head of Brethren(s). Please talk to Adventurer David.

journal.title: Old books
journal.contents:
You manage to retrieve the book that Argenta requested. Adventurer David also took a few of old books and disappear. Let's head back to Gray Ruins and report to Argenta.

Gray Ruins → Argenta
journal.destination: Talk to Argenta at Gray Ruins
journal.todo_msg: Book retrieved. Please report to Argenta in Gray Ruins.
